meta.title: VIG | Modern engineering systems
meta.desc: Design, production, installation, installation and maintenance of engineering systems
meta.keywords: ventilation, air conditioning, design, production, installation, lining, maintenance

goals.title: We can help you if you need:
list: Maintenance and support of existing systems is required
Computer-aided design, development of design and estimate documentation
Performing the functions of a comprehensive general contractor for engineering systems
Customer services, warranty and post-warranty service
goals.conclusion: Leave a request - and we can solve your problem!

services.title: Design
services.description: Design of internal engineering systems - ventilation, air conditioning, smoke removal, fire extinguishing. We will develop in accordance with regulatory documentation and technical specifications.

services.title:
Adjustment
work
services.description: Commissioning work - launching systems and checking all operating modes, testing and commissioning of the system before handing over the facility to the customer.

services.title: Montage
services.description: Installation of internal engineering systems - ventilation and air conditioning systems, smoke removal, fire extinguishing. We will carry out installation work of any complexity, taking into account acts and regulatory documents.

services.title: Service
services.description: Maintenance of ventilation and air conditioning systems - we will carry out technical and post-warranty maintenance of equipment, thanks to timely maintenance we will increase the service life of climate control equipment.
